content.text:
The work functioned as <image 1>

A. an icon
B. a book cover
C. an altarpiece
D. a purse lid

The image depicts an ornate, gold-embellished object with intricate designs and gemstones. Given the presence of religious imagery, such as the crucifixion scene in the center, it is most likely functioning as:

B. a book cover

This type of elaborate decoration is characteristic of medieval illuminated manuscripts, particularly those used for liturgical purposes.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
